strings.LOOK_FOR_SUMFILES: Look for sumfiles next to files being hashed
strings.SUMFILE_UNIX_ENDINGS: Export files with Unix line endings
strings.SUMFILE_USE_DOUBLE_SPACE: Export sumfiles with double space instead of space-asterisk
strings.SUMFILE_FORWARD_SLASHES: Use forward slash paths in exported files
strings.SUMFILE_DOT_HASH_COMPATIBLE: Export sumfiles in corz .hash compatible format
strings.UPDATE_NEWEST_TEXT: You are already on the latest version
strings.CLIPBOARD_AUTOENABLE: If clipboard contains a hash, automatically enable algorithms of that length for the run
strings.CLIPBOARD_AUTOENABLE_IF_NONE: Only if no algorithms of that length are enabled
strings.CHECKAGAINST_AUTOFORMAT: Automatically reformat pasted hashes in checker field
strings.CHECKAGAINST_STRICT: Strict mode for hash checker field
strings.HASH_SUMFILE_TOO: When processing a sumfile hash the sumfile too
strings.SUMFILE_ALGORITHM_ONLY: When processing a sumfile of known algorithm, disable other algorithms
